author: Albert Einstein
quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge.

author: Stephen Hawking
quote: However difficult life may seem there is always something you can do.

author: Sir Issac Newton
quote: If i have seen further, it is by standing on the shoulders of giants.

author: Madam Marie Curie
quote: Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood.

author: Nikol Tesla
quote: The present is theirs, the future for which i really worked is mine.

author: Carl Sagan
quote: Somewhere, somwthing incredible is waiting to be known.

author: Galileo Galilei
quote: All truths are easy to understand once they are discovered.

author: Charles Darwin
quote: It is not the strongest that survive but the most adaptable.

author: Thomas Edison
quote: I have not failed. I have just found 10,000 ways that won't work.

author: Isaac Newton
quote: If I have seen further, it is by standing on the shoulders of giants.

author: Nikola Tesla
quote: If you want to find the secrets of the universe, think in terms of energy, frequency and vibration.

author: Marie Curie
quote: Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood.

author: Stephen Hawking
quote: Intelligence is the ability to adapt to change.

author: Galileo Galilei
quote: All truths are easy to understand once they are discovered; the point is to discover them.

author: Richard Feynman
quote: I would rather have questions that can’t be answered than answers that can’t be questioned.

author: Carl Sagan
quote: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.

author: Charles Darwin
quote: It is not the strongest of the species that survive, nor the most intelligent, but the one most responsive to change.

author: Leonardo da Vinci
quote: Learning never exhausts the mind.

author: Rosalind Franklin
quote: Science and everyday life cannot and should not be separated.

author: Niels Bohr
quote: Prediction is very difficult, especially if it’s about the future.

author: Max Planck
quote: Science advances one funeral at a time.

author: Johannes Kepler
quote: Nature uses as little as possible of anything.

author: Aristotle
quote: The more you know, the more you realize you don't know.

author: Pythagoras
quote: There is geometry in the humming of the strings, there is music in the spacing of the spheres.

author: Hypatia
quote: Reserve your right to think, for even to think wrongly is better than not to think at all.

author: Alexander Fleming
quote: One sometimes finds what one is not looking for.

author: Dmitri Mendeleev
quote: There is nothing in this world that I fear to say.

author: James Clerk Maxwell
quote: Thoroughly conscious ignorance is the prelude to every real advance in science.
